title: Lillicoin
author: Lillicoin
created_time: May 23, 2022, 11:55:16 AMLast edit: July 08, 2022, 01:35:10 PM by Lillicoin
content: LapislazuliLapislazuli is a community focused on Masternode and Proof of Stake, a digital coin in which everyone can participate, with the freedom to choose how much to invest, in a simple, cheap and friendly way.Website- https://www.lillicoin.com/Discord- https://discord.gg/X3hVc6MuN4Telegram- https://t.me/lillicoinTwitter- https://twitter.com/CoinLilliCoingecko- https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/lapislazuliWallets- https://github.com/lapislazulicoin/lilli/releases/tag/1.0.1 Explorer- https://lilli-new.cryptoscope.io/Exchange- https://trade.birake.com/market/BIRAKE.LILLI_BIRAKE.BTCExchange- https://graviex.net/markets/lillibtcIhostmn Shared https://ihostmn.com/sharemn.php?id=213Masternodes https://masternodes.online/currencies/LILLI/Vaultwatch https://vaultwatch.eu/detail.php?coin=lilliCoinpaprika https://coinpaprika.com/coin/lilli-lapislazuli/Nodestat https://nodestats.info/default.php?coin=lilliWallet & Guide1- https://github.com/lapislazulicoin/lilli/releases/tag/1.0.12- https://github.com/lapislazulicoin/MNScriptCoin Specs:Coin Name: LapisLazuliTicker: LiLLiTotal Coin Supply: 10,000,000,000 LiLLiPremine: 15,500,000 LiLLiBlock Time: 60 SecondsMaturity: 100 BlockPorts: 19330 (p2p) / 19660 (rpc port)Prefix: LiLLi adresses start with the letter (Z)RoadmapBlockchain startedMay 2022Wallet development, and LiLLi presale.Active marketing (phase 1)May-June 2022Listing on Graviex, ihostmn, MNO, Birake Exchange, Coingecko.June-July 2022White paper presentation. Active marketing (phase 2)Aug-Sept 2022Final development of the LiLLi usecase project.
